question: The mosque in our locality only permits the followers of the four madhabs to pray in it.This notice is displayed at the entrance.Is this correct
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
In this time and age, people opposing Islam are great in number. Any means
will be used to propagate false sects. Thus, in protection of the community
against the Baatil sects, such a condition where only the people of Ahlus
Sunnah Wal Jamaa` perform Salaat in the local Musjid would only be a means
of protecting the pure Deen of Islam.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
